Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Celine/i: Oh! A Secret Santa gift? This is so thoughtful, [Ari]. I'll treasure it all season long!
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Caldarus: Long ago, the giving of gifts marked sacred occasions. I am honored to receive yours, [Ari].
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Darcy/in: Aw, [Ari]... a holiday gift? That's real sweet of you. I'll make sure to brew you something special in return.
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Dell/ini: WOW! A Secret Santa gift?! The Dragonguard is totally doing this every year!
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Dozy/ini: (Dozy sniffs your gift, then rolls onto his back in joy.)
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Eiland/i: A gift during the holidays? How delightfully traditional! Thank you, [Ari]!
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Elsie/in: Oho! A holiday gift? Darling, you do know how to flatter a lady. Thank you, [Ari] dear.
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Errol/in: A surprise gift? What fun! This tradition might just warrant a new exhibit. Thank you, [Ari]!
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Hayden/i: Aw, you didn't have to… but I'm real glad you did. This'll brighten up my winter chores for sure.
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Hemlock/: Haha! I knew participating in this Secret Santa thing would be worth it. You're full of surprises, [Ari].
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Henriett: (Henrietta flutters excitedly and pecks at the wrapping.)
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Holt/ini: A Secret Santa gift? Guess I'm not the only one handing out tree-mendous surprises this year. Thanks, [Ari]!
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Josephin: A Secret Santa gift? You sweet thing, [Ari]. Let me fetch you some cocoa before you go!
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Juniper/: A gift? For me? Wow you shouldn't have! Well yes... You should... OH HO HO HO!
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Landen/i: Hey, now that's what I call a surprise! You've still got some tricks up your sleeve, huh?
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Luc/init: Wow! A Secret Santa gift! Did you know beetles also give each other presents? Well… probably.
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Louis/in: Oh, how festive! And stylish, of course. This gift will do quite nicely, [Ari]. Thank you ever so!
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Maple/in: A Secret Santa gift...? You really got this just for me? Heehee… okay, maybe you are my favorite subject.
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/March/in: A Secret Santa thing? Huh. Well... thanks, I guess. It's actually kind of nice.
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Merri/in: A holiday gift? For me? Well now, that's just the kind of cheer I needed to brighten up my booth!
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Olric/in: Whoa! A Secret Santa gift? This rules! Did you wrap it yourself, [Ari]? It looks awesome!
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Nora/ini: A Secret Santa gift, [Ari]? That's very thoughtful. Reminds me what this season is all about.
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Reina/in: Oh! A Secret Santa gift? How thoughtful of you, [Ari]. It brings a special warmth to the holiday.
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Ryis/ini: ...Ah. This is... for me? Thank you, [Ari]. I wasn't expecting this. It means a lot.
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Stillwel: I foresaw something unusual under my tree this year... and here you are with it. Fascinating.
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Taliferr: Secret Santa? Hah! I knew this noble custom would reach even Mistria eventually. Acceptable.
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Terithia: Hah! A surprise gift? You're a sly one, [Ari]. I like that about you!
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Valen/in: A thoughtful gift, and during the holidays no less. I'll be sure to return the kindness.
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Wheedle/: A Secret Santa gift? Huhuhu! How delightfully sneaky. I approve!
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Vera/ini: Aww! A holiday surprise? [Ari], you're making me feel all sparkly inside!
Conversations/Mods/Secret Santa/Zorel/in: Oh, hey... this is for me? That's cool. Y'know, this kind of thing? Feels like harmony in gift form. Thanks, [Ari].
letters/secret_santa_first_year/local:
[Ari], 

Now that you're a part of our community I wanted to let you know about a special tradition we have during Winter. 

Every year we randomly select someone in town for each other to give a gift to. On the 27th, we surprise our assigned recipient with a heart-warming gift! 

I'll be sending out the notices in the mail on the 20th. Someone will secretly be assigned you, too!

letters/secret_santa_generic_gift/local:
[Ari], 

Adeline let me know that I'm your Secret Santa. You've become such an integral part of our community here in Mistria. Please accept this gift as a thank you for everything you've done.
letters/secret_santa_adeline_gift/local:
[Ari], 

I'm your Secret Santa this year! I wanted to give you something as a special thank you for everything you've done for Mistria. 

Don't worry, Balor assured me that he gave me a good deal on it!
letters/secret_santa_balor_gift/local:
[Ari], 

Guess who your Secret Santa is! 

I got this from a vendor in the capital during my last visit. I was planning on selling it, but...
letters/secret_santa_celine_gift/local:
[Ari], 

I hope you're staying warm! 

Please take some time to slow down and relax. 

I got this for you as your Secret Santa. I wrapped it myself, so please don't tear it open too fast! 

I really think you'll like it.
letters/secret_santa_dell_gift/local:
[Ari], 

I can't believe it!! Miss Adeline said I was your Secret Santa!!! 

I took a whole WEEK to decide what to get for you. I hope you like it! 

Oh, uhm... Celine and my parents helped too...

(There's a paw print stamped in the center of the letter.) 

(You're not sure who actually mailed this...)
letters/secret_santa_eiland_gift/local:
[Ari], 

I was thrilled when Adeline told me I was your Secret Santa. 

The holidays are more fun when celebrated together, wouldn't you agree? Enjoy this gift just for you!
letters/secret_santa_hayden_gift/local:
[Ari], 

The holidays are a wonderful time to spend with those special to you. 

I feel lucky to be your Secret Santa this year and hope this brings you joy and a smile!

I knew I was your Secret Santa even before Adeline told me. I do have a scrying orb, after all. 

It's also how I knew you would enjoy this gift even before you received it! 

Oh ho ho ho!!
letters/secret_santa_luc_gift/local:
[Ari], 

Adeline said I'm your Secret Santa! 

At first I was going to gift you one of my biggest bugs... 

But Mom and Maple said this would be better to mail. 

Don't worry, I'll just give you a bug next time!
letters/secret_santa_maple_gift/local:
[Ari], 

I, Queen Maple, am your Secret Santa this year. 

May this royal gift lift your spirits. 

The queen wills it!
letters/secret_santa_march_gift/local:
[Ari], 

Adeline asked if I could send you something for her Secret Santa project. 

Hopefully this is OK. It was her idea...
letters/secret_santa_reina_gift/local:
[Ari], 

Adeline told me I'm your Secret Santa this year! 

I originally wanted to send you one of my homemade winter dishes, but in this weather it would have gotten too cold! 

Hopefully this will suffice until you can stop by the inn for a nice warm meal.

[Ari], 

Looks like I'm your Secret Santa! 

Take a moment to pause and relax this holiday. That's what uncle always tells me.

I got this for you as a special thank you for everything you've done.
